All Bets Are Off.name: All Bets Are Off
All Bets Are Off.flavor: After landing a solid blow, you lash out with a quick jab, sending your enemy reeling.
All Bets Are Off.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Make a secondary attack against the same target.
All Bets Are Off.secondaryOnHit: 1d6 + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Deadly Payback.name: Deadly Payback
Deadly Payback.flavor: You react viciously to an enemy that just hurt you.
Deadly Payback.trigger: An enemy damages you with a melee attack.
Deadly Payback.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls against the triggering enemy.

Lion of Battle.name: Lion of Battle
Lion of Battle.flavor: You skewer yet another unworthy foe and let loose a tumultuous roar, shaking your weapon in triumph.
Lion of Battle.onHit: The secondary target must take a free action to move up to its speed to a square as far from you as possible.
Lion of Battle.effect: If the attack reduces the target to 0 hit points, you can make the secondary attack.
